pageProduct.name: Olay Regenerist Micro Sculpting Moisturiser Mini 14g
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream Face Cream Moisturiser firms, plumps & reduces wrinkles. Look up to 10 years younger in just 28 days!

Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream Face Cream Moisturiser firms, plumps & reduces wrinkles. Look up to 10 years younger in just 28 days!


Day 1. Visibly reduces pores, improves texture & radiance.
Day 14. Noticeably firmer skin.
Day 28. Visibly reduces lines & wrinkles.




Technology.




Formula, with Advanced Amino-Peptide Complex + Carbo Fruit Extract, helps renew skin's surface.




Hyaluronic Acid + Glycerol hydrates for plumper skin.

Look up to 10 years younger in just 28 days!

Size: 14g




Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. Important information, do not discard outer carton.

Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Isohexadecane, Niacinamide, Isopropyl Isostearate, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Nylon-12, Dimethicone, Panthenol, Stearyl Alcohol, Polyethylene, Cetyl Alcohol, Behenyl Alcohol, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Titanium Dioxide, Benzyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopheryl Acetate, Mica, Methylparaben, Ethylparaben, Dimethiconol, Polyacrylamide, Ceratonialiqua (Carob) Fruit Extract, Fragrance, PEG-100 Stearate, Propylparaben, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Sodium Hyaluronate, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Sodium PEG-7 Olive Oil Carboxylate, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, C12-13 Pareth-3, Laureth-7, Sodium Hydroxide, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4.

Directions

Using your fingertips, massage a small amount on the face and neck in an upward circular motion, focusing on areas like the brow and jaw line, which need more support. Use morning and night.

USAGE ADVICE

Regimen steps from Regenerist:
1 Cleanser.
2 Serum/Essence.
3 Moisturiser.
4 Eye/Treatment.
